1.name: Entry to Warg Alley
desc: If you are small enough to squirm through the small crumbling entry way,
you have the feeling that adventure awaits.

exits.desc: The opening leads to a large courtyard.
A side street lies to the west.

2.name: Courtyard
desc: Large Courtyard with a bricked over arched entryway is to the west.
The courtyard has the look of long neglect and is covered with
unhealthy looking litter.

exits.desc: Bricked over archway with a small hole.

3.name: Courtyard
desc: Northwest corner of a large, dirty courtyard. Strangely quiet, you feel a
faint unease as you peer east.

4.name: Courtyard
desc: North side of the large courtyard. Suddenly a loud, mad howl of an unknown
beast reverberates through the courtyard.

5.name: Courtyard
desc: Northeast corner of the courtyard. Again the howl of the mad animal rings
out. It sounds vaguely doglike. Still there is some quality that you just
can't put your finger on.

6.name: Courtyard
desc: Center of the large, neglected courtyard. You feel very vulnerable to
attack from all sides here.

7.name: Courtyard
desc: East side of the courtyard. The howls are getting clearer now. The east wall
of the courtyard has a chewed look. What could be so hungry that it would
chew earthen bricks?

8.name: Courtyard
desc: Southwest corner of a large, dirty courtyard. Strangely quiet, you feel a
faint unease as you peer east.

9.name: Courtyard
desc: South side of the large courtyard. Suddenly a loud, mad howl of an unknown
beast reverberates through the courtyard.

10.name: Courtyard
desc: Southeast corner of the courtyard. Again the howl of the mad animal rings
out. It sounds vaguely doglike. Still there is some quality that you just
can't put your finger on. You can make out the beginnings of a decayed meat
stench...

exits.desc: Dark, roughly chewed opening to the east.

11.name: Mirky Alley
desc: A dimly lit alleyway stretches before you. If you look directly up, you
can see the beautiful sky.

12.name: Mirky Alley
desc: A dimly lit alleyway stretches before you. If you look directly up, you
can see less of the beautiful sky.

13.name: Mirky Alley
desc: A dimly lite alleyway stretches before you. If you look directly up, you
can see very little of the beautiful sky. You are beginning to wonder if you
should turn back.

14.name: Growling Alley
desc: The howls have now given way to deep throated growls. If you look up now,
you will find that you can now longer see the sky. Aren't you glad you
brought a light? But you shiver with the thought that it could burn out.

15.name: Growling Alley
desc: The howls have now given way to deep throated growls. It hard to imagine how
there can be a darker, scarier alleyway anywhere.

16.name: Growling Alley
16.desc: The growls are getting worst. This is getting on your nerves.

17.name: Growling Alley
17.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are beginning to vibrate.

18.name: Growling Alley
18.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are beginning to vibrate.

19.name: Growling Alley
19.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are beginning to vibrate.

20.name: Growling Alley
20.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are beginning to vibrate.

21.name: Growling Alley
21.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are beginning to vibrate.

22.name: Growling Alley
22.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are beginning to vibrate.

23.name: Growling Alley
23.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are beginning to vibrate.

24.name: Growling Alley
24.desc: The growls are becoming so strong that the walls are vibrating.

25.name: Growling Alley
desc: No it is not your imagination, the walls are visually vibrating. Will they
stay up?

26.name: Growling Alley
desc: How much longer to you have to put up with this growling? Of course the
gnawed bones littering the alley are of some concern also.

27.name: Growling Alley
desc: You can no longer hear the growling. The frequency of the growling has dropped
below your hearing range. Still the walls are shaking!

28.name: Shaking Alley
desc: The walls are shaking and so is the ground. The litter of bones has grown.
scattered among the bones is a lot of loose, brownish fur.

29.name: Quiet Intersection
desc: The vibrating has stopped. Instead, there is a hungry anticipation hanging
in the air.

30.name: Mirky Alley
desc: A dimly lite alleyway stretches before you. If you look directly up, you
can see less of the beautiful sky.

31.name: Mirky Alley
31.desc: The alley has quickly closed on you. Ahead is darkness, back is light.

32.name: Warg-Fido Den
desc: A large den of the most unholy combination. A warg stud and his fido mates
are here defending their pack of half-grown half breeds. Still the offspring
are very hungry and glad to see you.

33.name: Northern Alley
desc: As you step into the alleyway, a cold shiver runs down your spine.
This area is clean and well lite. Why? Why haven't the warg-fido's
messed this area up too?

34.name: Large well kept house
desc: The floor of this well kept house is covered with the skins of countless
wargs. But every once in awhile, you see what could be a human skin among
the warg skins. The walls are covered with beautiful tapestries depicting
battles against lamias. For some reason, the lamias are always winning.

35.name: Warg Master Study
desc: This looks like the room of a master thinker.  The room is littered with
paper everywhere.  The walls are covered with unusual writings.  You sure
wish you had spent more time studying at school, instead of spending all
your spare time off adventuring.  The window on the far side of the study
overlooks a plush forest in the distance.

36.name: Quiet tunnel
desc: You are in the middle of a dirt tunnel. The footprints in the soft dirt
floor look like someone was walking on stilts.

37.name: Edge of anthill
37.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

38.name: Edge of anthill
38.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

39.name: Edge of anthill
39.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

40.name: Edge of anthill
40.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

41.name: Edge of anthill
41.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

42.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

43.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

44.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

45.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

46.name: Top of Anthill
desc: Ah, you have reached the top of the hill. Congratulations! From here, you
can see the opening into the anthill. Do you dare go in? All it takes is
just one little step down...

47.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

48.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

49.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

50.name: Anthill
desc: You are standing midway up a large mound of hard packed dirt. All around you
are ants.

51.name: Edge of anthill
51.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

52.name: Edge of anthill
52.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

53.name: Edge of anthill
53.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

54.name: Edge of anthill
54.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

55.name: Edge of anthill
55.desc: You stand on the outside edge of a large anthill.

56.name: Quiet tunnel
desc: You are in the middle of a dirt tunnel. The footprints in the soft dirt
floor look like someone was walking on stilts.

57.name: Entrance to nest
desc: You are standing on a small ledge. About 6 feet below you, you can see the
staff turn horizontal. Above you, you can see the exit to the ant nest. Do
humans really belong here?

58.name: Inside nest
desc: You are standing at the bottom of the shaft. Way above you, you can see the
exit. There is a tunnel nearly 8 feet in diameter off to the north, but it
curves to the east after about 30 feet. The walls of the tunnel seem to be
coated solid, sickly white material.

59.name: Curve in nest
desc: The white tunnels are beginning to close in on you. This would be a perfect
place to defend the tunnels if one was so inclined.

60.name: Long, quite tunnel
desc: The tunnel widens as it continues east. The white walls could make weaker
people feel sick. Still, it is nice and quiet here. Wonder why??

61.name: Tunnel intersection
desc: Hmmm.... Now what? Should you continue east, or north. Perhaps if you are
wise, you will go back and leave these white halls to their rightful owners.

62.name: Long, quite tunnel
desc: To the east, you hear a lot of noise and you notice an odd smell. Still the
walls are the same sickly white, but you notice that the quality of the walls
has degraded.

63.name: Worker's quarters
desc: Ah, now this is more like home! This must be where the ant's actually live.
This place is a mess. If it weren't for the sickly white walls and all these
ants, you could mistake this place for your bedroom.

64.name: Long, quite tunnel
desc: To the west, you hear a lot of noise and you notice an sweet smell. Still the
walls are the same sickly white, but you notice that the quality of the walls
has upgraded.

65.name: The Queen's chambers
desc: You are standing in a huge, beautiful, perfumed room. How would have thought
that this ugly white could actually be made to look wonderful! Why would
simple ants do that?
